title: Elementalist Lux
body: Hi, just wanted when will elementalist lux be available to purchase cuz its unavailable right now and can't wait i already have the rp{{champion:99}}

replies.body: That question is still to be answered, no one really knows but Riot {{sticker:slayer-jinx-unamused}}
It seems they don't even know...

I hope it never comes out. 
Lux is my most hated champion, I had to vs about 6 of them today.
And when Elementalist Lux comes out, everyones going to be playing her.
Lucky me.
{{sticker:slayer-jinx-unamused}} 

We don't know when shes coming out, check out surrender@20 or something for release dates when we get them.
